Problem:
Why is he trying to read from $DF12 and $DF13 instead of $D012 and $D013 ?


Decoded instructions

D8 58 A0 7F 8C 12 D0 A9 A7 8D 11 D0 8D 13 D0 C9 DF F0 13 C9 9B F0 3 C8 10 F A9 DC 20 EF 0 0 0

                  * = FF00
FF00   D8         CLD
FF01   58         CLI
FF02   A0 7F      LDY #$7F
FF04   8C 12 D0   STY $D012
FF07   A9 A7      LDA #$A7
FF09   8D 11 D0   STA $D011
FF0C   8D 13 D0   STA $D013
FF0F   C9 DF      CMP #$DF
FF11   F0 13      BEQ $FF26
FF13   C9 9B      CMP #$9B
FF15   F0 3C      BEQ $FF53
FF17   81 0F      STA ($0F,X)
FF19   A9 DC      LDA #$DC
FF1B   20 EF 00   JSR $00EF
FF1E              .END



Address bin	- bin	- hex	- R/W	- content of memory bus

Honey's device launch
0000111111111111 - 4095 - FFF - R - 0
0000111111111111 - 4095 - FFF - R - 0
0000111100000000 - 3840 - F00 - R - 0
0000111100000000 - 3840 - F00 - R - 0
